attributes.action: instruct the royal mint to place saint george on the rear of all english £1 coins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: show some respect to the christians in great britain and place the image of saint george on the rear of all english £1 coins . some Gibralter £1 coins feature the image of saint george slaying a dragon . Will British politicians in westminster have the guts to support this campaign or will the p.c. brigade start crying and claim this petition may offend some unknown people somewhere ?
